title: Is Amagi’s IPO a long-term bet for high risk investors?
full_text: Is Amagi’s IPO a long-term bet for high risk investors?. Amagi Media Labs plans to raise ₹816 crore via a fresh issue for cloud infrastructure and inorganic growth, with an additional ₹973 crore through an offer for sale.
